title: Certificate-Based Authentication Issue
description: A user is unable to access a secure internal website because their client certificate has expired.

tasks.description: Receive the user's report that they are getting a certificate error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst understands the nature of the user's issue.

tasks.description: Check the status of the user's certificate in the Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) management tool and confirm it has expired.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the root cause of the problem.

tasks.description: Issue a new client certificate to the user and guide them through the process of installing it in their browser.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully resolves the issue by issuing and installing a new certificate.
